titles.title: Accounting for Methane in Production through Loophole Elimination with Oil and Gas Royalties
AMPLE Oil and Gas Royalties Act
To require Federal oil and gas leases to report and pay royalties on oil and gas production based on the actual volume of oil and gas withdrawn under a lease, and for other purposes.
